info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Gusty showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of Lake, east central Kane, DuPage, Cook, northwestern Porter and northern Lake Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hoffman Estates to New Chicago. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Elgin, Waukegan, Cicero, Hammond, Gary, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Schaumburg, Palatine, Skokie, Des Plaines, Oak Lawn, Berwyn, Mount Prospect, Wheaton, Hoffman Estates, Oak Park, Downers Grove and Glenview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
